## Overview

Day 4 provides an in-depth exploration of Agent-Based Modeling for supply chain applications. Dr. Ozawa will lead this session, building on the foundations from Days 1-3.

## Learning Objectives

By the end of Day 4, you will be able to:

- Design agent behaviors for supply chain modeling
- Implement ordering rules and inventory policies
- Run and analyze supply chain simulations
- Interpret ABM outputs for policy recommendations
